practice_phrases.known: your coffee
I have your coffee
your coffee is ready
I like your coffee
where is your coffee?
I knew your coffee was broken
your coffee is ready right now
I thought your coffee would be great
practice_phrases.target: 我认为你的咖啡会很好

practice_phrases.known: I'd like to have a cup like your coffee
practice_phrases.target: 我想要一杯像你的咖啡

practice_phrases.known: I was very thirsty so I drank your coffee
practice_phrases.target: 我很渴所以我喝了你的咖啡

practice_phrases.known: Coffee is ready
Your coffee is ready
Tea is ready

Your tea is ready
I knew the coffee is ready
I knew your coffee is ready
Do you want something to drink? Coffee is ready
practice_phrases.target: 你想喝点什么吗？咖啡好了

practice_phrases.known: Do you want coffee or tea? Coffee is ready
practice_phrases.target: 你想要咖啡还是茶？咖啡好了

practice_phrases.known: Yes, that would be great. Your coffee is ready
practice_phrases.target: 是的，那太好了。你的咖啡好了
